<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enchanting Arrow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1962) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 173 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=59)

**Prerequisites**
[Eldritch Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1960)

</column>

---

With a single whisper carried on the wind, you enchant your ammunition to make a foe more vulnerable to your attacks. Make a bow Strike. On a hit, the target takes an additional 2d6 mental damage. On a critical hit, the target also becomes [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36). The mental damage increases to 3d6 if your bow has a [_greater striking_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) rune, or to 4d6 if your bow has a _major striking_ rune.
name: Enchanting Arrow
